name: Better Tomorrows
description:
Better Tomorrows

Build your business despite the international political tension.

How to play?

  • Click on the letter.
  • Click on the wooden log in the left top corner to make your first money.
  • You can make money by collecting mushrooms and berries. But be considerate of the forest.

Source code

Source code is available here on GitHub. If you want to open the game, you will need a Game Maker 2.

Sounds made with BFXR; one sound made with FL Studio.

  • Most of the visual assets were created in Inkscape.
  • Aseprite was used for quick and dirty editing.
  • PSD files are from Photopea.
